comment: I took him for Society, Community and Health. Amazing professor but be prepared to read several books and write papers on them. Discussion posts and exams are fairly easy and he's there when you need him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: There are weekly discussion boards and quizzes along with one paper, midterm, and final exam. All of the answers are found in the textbook and weekly powerpoint so make sure you keep up with the reading assignments. The final exam was cumulative.
